actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-529, by Mr. Frost.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2567 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. It shall be in order to consider the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs now printed in the bill as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule. All points of order against said substitute for failure to comply with the provisions of clause 7 of rule XVI are waived. Measure will be read by title. Specified amendments are in order. Only pro forma amendments for the purpose of debate and those amendments printed in the "Amendment" portion of the Congressional Record prior to the consideration of the bill are in order.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 118.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 250 - 167 (Roll no. 165).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2567) to authorize additional appropriations for the construction of the Buffalo Bill Dam and Reservoir, Shoshone Project, Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin Program, Wyoming.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2567 (Buffalo Bill Dam and Reservoir, Wyoming).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2567) to authorize additional appropriations for the construction of the Buffalo Bill Dam and Reservoir, Shoshone Project, Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin Program, Wyoming.
